title: The Avengers (2012) 1080p Rifftrax 6ch 2ch
description:
The.Avengers.2012.1080p.Rifftrax.6ch.2ch.mkv

DEFAULT AUDIO IS TRACK1 MOVIE PLUS RIFFTRAX
FOR MOVIE ONLY SOUND SWITCH TO TRACK2 FOR 5.1 OR TRACK3 FOR 2.0

The Avengers (2012)
video: 1920x1080 AVC
audio1 (default): movie plus Rifftrax AAC 2.0
audio2: just movie AAC 5.1
audio3: just movie AAC 2.0
subs: English built in, off by default, not hard coded, software switchable
post-credits scene 1: 1m40s after last riff
intro: 1s after post-credits scene 1
post-credits scene 2: 3m18s after intro
Rifftrax released 2012.12.27 2h22m55s 2,893,041,825bytes

This is a remux with the Rifftrax commentary added as the default audio track. The Rifftrax audio track has been newly remastered to ensure the riff comments are just loud enough to be clear when the movie is loud and not too loud when the movie is quiet. Please leave any feedback regarding the Rifftrax audio remastering.

Big thanks to the posters of the 1080p/5.1 encodes of the movies, the subs and the chapters.
